metadata.name: ANEMOS
metadata.description:
Swept up by the winds of change. 

PET LIGER x VIIRA x AKITO x SKETCHY VISUALS. 

In collaboration with the immensely talented computational architect Pico Velasquez, VIIRA, plus the digital mastery of SKETCHY VISUALS, featuring cutting edge sound design from highly regarded producer and performer AKITO. PET LIGER presents a first of its kind encapsulated living art piece merging virtual footwear & generative design at their first ever exhibition at WHITE SHOW between September 22nd - 26th, during Milan Fashion Week. The centerpiece of WHITE Milan -  a monolith displaying this artwork, blending the physical and digital worlds.
